title: Plasmonics for solid-state lighting: enhanced excitation and directional emission of highly efficient light sources
title_cn: 固态照明等离子技术：高效光源的增强激发和定向发射
abstract: Light sources based on reliable and energy-efficient light-emitting diodes (LEDs) are instrumental in the development of solid-state lighting (SSL). Most research efforts in SSL have focused on improving both the intrinsic quantum efficiency (QE) and the stability of light emitters. For this reason, it is broadly accepted that with the advent of highly efficient (QE close to 1) and stable emitters, the fundamental research phase of SSL is coming to an end. In this study, we demonstrate a very large improvement in SSL emission (above 70-fold directional enhancement for p-polarized emission and 60-fold enhancement for unpolarized emission) using nanophotonic structures. This is attained by coupling emitters with very high QE to collective plasmonic resonances in periodic arrays of aluminum nanoantennas. Our results open a new path for fundamental and applied research in SSL in which plasmonic nanostructures are able to mold the spectral and angular distribution of the emission with unprecedented precision.
abstract_cn: 基于可靠且节能的发光二极管（LED）的光源在固态照明（SSL）的开发中发挥了重要作用。 SSL的大多数研究工作都集中在提高固有量子效率（QE）和发光体的稳定性上。因此，随着高效（QE接近1）和稳定发射器的出现，SSL的基础研究阶段即将结束，这已被广泛接受。在这项研究中，我们证明了使用纳米光子结构在SSL发射方面有非常大的改善（p偏振发射的方向增强了70倍，非偏振发射的增强了60倍）。这是通过将具有很高QE的发射器耦合到铝纳米天线的周期性阵列中的集体等离子体共振来实现的。我们的研究结果为SSL的基础和应用研究开辟了一条新的道路，其中等离子纳米结构能够以前所未有的精度塑造发射的光谱和角度分布。

title: Laser patterning for the study of MSC cardiogenic differentiation at the single-cell level
title_cn: 用于单细胞水平研究MSC心脏分化的激光成像
abstract: Mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs) have been cited as contributors to heart repair through cardiogenic differentiation and multiple cellular interactions, including the paracrine effect, cell fusion, and mechanical and electrical couplings. Due to heart–muscle complexity, progress in the development of knowledge concerning the role of MSCs in cardiac repair is heavily based on MSC–cardiomyocyte coculture. In conventional coculture systems, however, the in vivo cardiac muscle structure, in which rod-shaped cells are connected end-to-end, is not sustained; instead, irregularly shaped cells spread randomly, resulting in randomly distributed cell junctions. Consequently, contact-mediated cell–cell interactions (e.g., the electrical triggering signal and the mechanical contraction wave that propagate through MSC–cardiomyocyte junctions) occur randomly. Thus, the data generated on the beneficial effects of MSCs may be irrelevant to in vivo biological processes. In this study, we explored whether cardiomyocyte alignment, the most important phenotype, is relevant to stem cell cardiogenic differentiation. Here, we report (i) the construction of a laser-patterned, biochip-based, stem cell–cardiomyocyte coculture model with controlled cell alignment; and (ii) single-cell-level data on stem cell cardiogenic differentiation under in vivo-like cardiomyocyte alignment conditions.
abstract_cn: 间充质干细胞（MSCs）被认为是通过心源性分化和多种细胞相互作用（包括旁分泌效应，细胞融合以及机械和电耦合）对心脏修复的贡献者。由于心脏肌肉的复杂性，有关MSC在心脏修复中作用的知识的发展很大程度上依赖于MSC心肌细胞共培养。然而，在常规的共培养系统中，杆状细胞首尾相连的体内心肌结构是不能维持的。取而代之的是，形状不规则的细胞随机散布，导致细胞接头随机分布。因此，接触介导的细胞相互作用（例如，通过MSC心肌细胞接头传播的电触发信号和机械收缩波）随机发生。因此，关于MSC的有益作用而产生的数据可能与体内生物学过程无关。在这项研究中，我们探讨了最重要的表型心肌细胞排列是否与干细胞的心源性分化有关。在这里，我们报告（i）具有受控细胞排列的激光模式，基于生物芯片的干细胞与心肌细胞共培养模型的构建； （ii）体内样心肌细胞排列条件下干细胞心脏分化的单细胞水平数据。</ p>

title: Polymeric photonic molecule super-mode lasers on silicon
title_cn: 硅上的聚合光子分子超模激光器
abstract: Optically coupled microcavities have emerged as photonic structures with promising properties for investigation of fundamental science as well as for applications. We report on the fabrication and spatially resolved spectroscopy of on-chip photonic molecule (PM) lasers consisting of two coupled, dye-doped polymeric microdisks on a silicon substrate. We investigate the fundamental lasing properties with focus on the spatial distribution of modes, the coupling dependent suppression of lasing modes, and in particular the application-oriented operation of these devices in aqueous environments. By depositing an additional polymer layer onto the lithographically structured cavities made of dye-doped poly(methyl methacrylate), coupling-gap widths below 150 nm with aspect ratios of the micro-/nanostructure exceeding 9∶1 are achieved. This enables strong optical coupling at visible wavelengths despite relatively small resonator radii of 25 µm. The lasing properties of dye-doped PMs are investigated using spatially resolved micro-photoluminescence (μ-PL) spectroscopy. This technique allows for the direct imaging of whispering-gallery modes (WGMs) in the photonics molecules. For subwavelength coupling gaps, we observe lasing from delocalized eigenstates of the PMs (termed in the following as super-modes). Using size-mismatched cavities, the lasing mode suppression for different coupling-gap widths is investigated. We further demonstrate single-mode lasing operation in aqueous environments with PMs, which are realized on a low-cost, polymer-on-silicon platform.
abstract_cn: 光耦合微腔已成为具有光子学结构的光子结构，可用于基础科学的研究和应用。我们报告了由硅衬底上的两个耦合的，染料掺杂的聚合物微盘组成的片上光子分子（PM）激光器的制造和空间分辨光谱学。我们研究了基本的激射特性，重点是模式的空间分布，依赖于激射模式的耦合抑制，特别是这些设备在水性环境中的面向应用的操作。通过在由染料掺杂的聚（甲基丙烯酸甲酯）制成的光刻结构型腔上沉积一个额外的聚合物层，可以实现耦合间隙宽度低于150 nm，且微观/纳米结构的长宽比超过9＆＃8758; 1。尽管谐振器半径相对较小，为25μm，但仍可以在可见波长处实现强光耦合。使用空间分辨的微光致发光（＆＃956; -PL）光谱研究了掺杂染料的PM的激光特性。该技术允许对光子分子中的耳语画廊模式（WGM）进行直接成像。对于亚波长耦合间隙，我们从PM的离域本征态观察到激光（以下称为超模）。使用尺寸不匹配的腔，研究了不同耦合间隙宽度的激光模式抑制。我们进一步演示了在带有PM的水性环境中的单模激光操作，该操作在低成本的硅上聚合物平台上实现。
